metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3498 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GStreamer before 1.18.4 might cause heap corruption when parsing certain malformed Matroska files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3498` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gstreamer1.0-gtk3 - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
gstreamer1.0-plugins-good - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
gstreamer1.0-pulseaudio - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
gstreamer1.0-qt5 - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
libgstreamer-plugins-good1.0-0 - 1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> xenial does not uses affected variable/code dest_context.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.16.2-1ubuntu2.1').
